about_the_game:
About This Game
Popo & Rob is a team-based first-person shooter designed for quick, thrilling matches in a vibrant, colorful world that redefines freedom of movement. Featuring two unique factions—Popo and Rob—the game pits players against each other in battles where every match feels fresh, thanks to fully explorable environments with surfaces you can walk on from any orientation.

Key Features

Freedom of Movement

Forget what you know about gravity! In Popo & Rob, players can walk, run, and fight on any surface they see, opening up a myriad of strategic possibilities. You’re not limited to just the ground—rooftops, walls, and every possible angle are fair game.

Diverse Characters and Skills

Each character in Popo & Rob comes with a unique skill set and gun type, letting you approach battles with a play style that suits you best. Some characters may be more tactical, while others are all about direct firepower, giving players plenty of choices.

Casual-Friendly, Yet Challenging

While Popo & Rob is easy for newcomers to pick up, it also offers layers of depth for FPS veterans. The simple controls and streamlined mechanics ensure accessibility, but mastering each character’s skills and movement across varying surfaces adds a level of challenge.

Colorful, Anime-Inspired Aesthetic

The game’s aesthetic draws from anime and fun, stylized visuals reminiscent of games like Splatoon. Every map is filled with vibrant colors and bold designs that keep gameplay visually engaging and inviting.

Pick Your Faction, Play Your Way

Will you side with the fun-loving Popo or the resourceful Rob? Each faction offers its own style and strategies, creating a distinct identity that sets up every match as a playful clash of styles.

Join the world of Popo & Rob for endless FPS fun, coming this December on Steam.

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

Choose your side, Popo or Rob, and immerse yourself in a world that’s bright, bold, and brimming with fun.
